description: In a misconfigured scenario the ImagePropertiesFilter can raise an exception which causes the image to be unbuildable in the region.  This happens when the capabilities is set for prominent_hypervisor_version to '[]' or an empty list.  We should be resilient to this case and handle the exception.
title: Cells ImagePropertiesFilter can raise exceptions

comments.content: In a misconfigured scenario the ImagePropertiesFilter can raise an exception which causes the image to be unbuildable in the region.  This happens when the capabilities is set for prominent_hypervisor_version to '[]' or an empty list.  We should be resilient to this case and handle the exception.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~christopher-lefelhoc

commit 70e0d3f13bd2ffaa19ddb6a50074723a7dbb0226
Author: Christopher Lefelhocz <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jul 17 14:17:47 2014 -0500

    Fix Cells ImagePropertiesFilter can raise exceptions
    
    In a misconfigured scenario the ImagePropertiesFilter can raise an
    exception which causes the image to be unbuildable in the region. This
    happens when the capabilities is set for prominent_hypervisor_version
    to an empty list.
    
    Change-Id: I17bd9d87fa69ad34b19591018543a34dfd050978
    Closes-Bug: 1343462
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
